left.text: so pancake, i beat up a kid half my size who was wearing a dimmu borgir shirt

right.text: after all, dimmu borgir isn't trve and fvkk blvkk metal

left.text: i bet you would, you tough-guy, you playboy

right.text: it's either really fast double bass or really slow double bass, and then a stupid breakdown and then an incomprehensible guitar solo

left.text: but... it all sounds the same...
